text: Ezɨ kɨ kamaghsua, ia deraghavɨra kamaghɨn fogh. Bar guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ na amadazɨ, kɨ iza akar kɨ ia mɨkemezir kabav gei. Eghtɨ ia na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham, ia kamaghɨn fogh, ia gumazir arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨzim puram a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghtɨ, ia an osɨmtɨzim iniam. Eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir kam a nguibar ekiar kamɨn ikɨva, uaghan bar moghɨra nguibar kamɨn gumazamiziba sara ikiam.”
